example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <InputField label="Maximum price" type="number" prefix="$" />
    <InputField
      label="Search"
      placeholder="Search by keyword"
      type="text"
      inputMode="search"
      prefix={<Icons.Search />}
    />
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Prefixes
info.description: If you need additional context, you can add it as a prefix.
